mapper.sql: ntc_idx, ntc_title, emp_id, ntc_content, to_char(ntc_regdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') as ntc_regdate , ntc_update, ntc_count, ntc_delat
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_notice ( ntc_idx, ntc_title, emp_id, ntc_content, ntc_count, ntc_delat, ntc_regdate, ntc_update ) VALUES ( seq_notice.nextval, #{ntcTitle}, #{empId}, #{ntcContent}, 0, 'F', sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ntc_idx, a.ntc_title, a.emp_id, b.EMP_NAME, b.EMP_DIV, a.ntc_content, a.ntc_count, to_char(a.ntc_regdate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') as ntc_regdate, a.ntc_update, a.ntc_delat FROM tb_notice a ,tb_employee b WHERE a.emp_id = b.emp_id AND ntc_idx = #{ntcIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_notice SET ntc_title = #{ntcTitle}, ntc_content = #{ntcContent}, ntc_update = sysdate WHERE ntc_idx = #{ntcIdx}
UPDATE tb_notice SET ntc_delat = 'T', ntc_update = sysdate WHERE ntc_idx = #{ntcIdx}
